MY STORY

Hello There!

I’m Elisa. A Graphic & Web designer from Ottawa, Ontario, and currently a third year Graphic Design Student at Algonquin college. I am a problem solver, and love puzzles. I let my creativity flow. Illustrator is my favourite program to create my illustrations.
